channel.title: What Website Do I Use To Get The Code To Put Pictures On My Forum Post?
channel.description:
What Website Do I Use To Get The Code To Put Pictures On My Forum Post?
Image shack wouldn't work i tried .....Thumbnail for Websites Thumbnail for forums (1) Thumbnail for forums (2)... .....but none of them worked, could someone help please?
thank you,
Ashley.
~PimpScapePk Ownz - Join Now! More Info In My SigNature~

item.title: What Website Do I Use To Get The Code To Put Pictures On My Forum Post?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

To correctly post a picture, use the “Direct link to image” link on imageshack, and enclose the image in the [img][/1mg] tags. This thread belongs in the “Questions” forum, as it is not related to moparscape. Moved.

Read full topic

ok ill give all steps first at bottom or top bar click reply. then you will get to a place which looks like tilis picture there you would click additional options then click browse at attach:: bar you can post any screenshots from there.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 03:32:51 PM[/size][hr]on the thread your in now click reply!

item.title: What Website Do I Use To Get The Code To Put Pictures On My Forum Post?
item.dc:creator: @slitheren_20 slitheren 20
item.description:
@slitheren_20 wrote:

there is no code jsut click on reply and at the bottom you will see additional options. click on it there is these three options Notify me of replies.
Return to this topic. Don’t use smileys. under that it says attach: so click browse and it will go to screenshots then click open and it will attach. to attack more go to more attachments.

Read full topic
